technology: There were no technical difficulties during the conversation.
cur_neg_affect: The participant did not express much negative affect about the pandemic in the present, but did mention that she still wears a mask.
past_neg_affect: The participant expressed some negative affect when recalling the past, mentioning that it was scary to see all the content about the pandemic.
communal_orientation: The participant engaged in conversation and asked questions, but did not give affirmations or seem entirely engaged.
engagement: The participant was engaged in the conversation and genuinely conversed with their partner.
defensiveness: The participant was not at all defensive in justifying their beliefs/perspective.
vaccine_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of vaccines.
booster_importance: The participant did not explicitly state their belief about the importance of boosters.
cognitive_complexity: The participant demonstrated a moderate amount of cognitive complexity by considering different perspectives and recognizing nuance in the conversation.
general_notes: The participant was hesitant about the vaccine, but got it because it was required for work.
